General.Name: Mingzhu Logistics Holdings Ltd
General.Description: MingZhu Logistics Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides trucking services to transportation industry in the People's Republic of China. It offers car-hailing and driver management services, and car owner services. The company serves sizeable third-party logistics companies, freight forwarders, and warehouse operators, as well as other supply chain service providers. The company was founded was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Yantian Modern Industry Service Center, Shenzhen, China, 518081
